page.title: 11The Dinas Cricket Club
page.content:
{ *************** { {Cricket has been a popular pastime in {many towns and villages in Britain for {many years. In this part of West {Wales,however, organised Cricket teams {have only sprung up in the past five {years or so. {Dinas' team was only formed in 1980.
Dinas plays in the Pembrokeshire (Division VI) League.They have 22 members and field two teams.They play one friendly match a week as well as their league matches.They don't organise any kind of social activities apart from their games. The team play in the playing field in Dinas but one boy we spoke to said he plays in his bedroom as well!!
{ *******************
